title: What are Richard Ayoade's best performances? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everyone loves Richard Ayoade as an actor. His quirky sense of humor is well known, particularly in The IT Crowd. But Richard Ayoade stunned me as the director of the little known indie film The Double starring Jesse Eisenberg.   ​Based on Dostoevsky's novel, Ayoade adds generous doses of sarcasm and dark humor to the well known tale of doppelgangers. Recommended.
